mapper.select: SELECT crew.crewId, crew.crewName, crew.content, crew.schedule, crew.tag, crew.location, crew.regDate, crew.memberNum, crew.leader FROM activity LEFT OUTER JOIN crew ON activity.activityId = crew.tag WHERE isInside = #{isInside} AND isSingle = #{isSingle} AND isCardio = #{isCardio} AND useEquip = #{useEquip}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew(crewName, content, schedule, tag, location, memberNum, leader) values (#{crewName}, #{content}, #{schedule}, #{tag}, #{location},#{memberNum}, #{leader})
mapper.select: SELECT crew.crewId, crew.crewName, crew.content, crew.schedule, crew.tag, crew.location, crew.regDate, crew.memberNum, crew.leader FROM crew WHERE crewName = #{crewName}
